articles.title: Doctors can tell whether you have cardiovascular disease by listening to your VOICE - Daily Mail
articles.description: American researchers have trained an algorithm to spot tiny changes in the human voice and those it found to be high risk were over 2.5 times likelier to need hospital care for a heart problem.
articles.content:
